title: Expanded development: add placeholder backend domain types module (Issue, Task, FeedPost)

requirements.text: Create a shared backend types module at `backend/types.mo` (it does not currently exist) and define an empty placeholder domain type for `Issue` as a public type alias (e.g., `public type Issue = {};`).

quotes: What are the next 3 atomic micro steps, aside from the profile or design, and solely focused on the expanded development steps

acceptanceCriteria: A new file `backend/types.mo` exists in the backend canister codebase.
`backend/types.mo` contains `public type Issue = {};` (or equivalent empty record type alias) and compiles.
`dfx build` (or equivalent canister build) succeeds without requiring a state migration.

requirements.text: In `backend/types.mo`, define an empty placeholder domain type for `Task` as a public type alias (e.g., `public type Task = {};`).

acceptanceCriteria: `backend/types.mo` contains `public type Task = {};` (or equivalent empty record type alias) and compiles.

acceptanceCriteria: `backend/types.mo` contains `public type FeedPost = {};` (or equivalent empty record type alias) and compiles.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all executable logic stays in `backend/main.mo`).
Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not address the Profile page infinite spinner/loading issue as part of this change.
Do not perform any UI redesign or visual theme changes as part of this change.
Do not add new backend methods/endpoints for issues/tasks/feed beyond the requested placeholder type aliases.
